title: Marketplace Roundtable #52: Picking Stocks In Irrational Markets With The Fortune Teller
description: The Fortune Teller joins the Marketplace Roundtable Podcast to discuss his investing experience as reflected in the Wheel of Fortune service. TFT's strategy starts with a comprehensive view of the entire market across asset classes. The primary concern is risk. "We think that our first responsibility is assessing and calculating the risk," says TFT. "Risk management lies at the very core and essence of everything we do."
itunes:title: Picking Stocks In Irrational Markets With The Fortune Teller
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: The author discusses how macro trumps micro and what he's picking in today's climate.
